```markdown
14. Mark for Review

If $\frac{x - 17}{18} = \frac{x - 17}{6}$, what is the value of $x + 17$?

A) 0  
B) 3  
C) 17  
D) 34  
```

questions.question_text: If $ rac{x - 17}{18} =  rac{x - 17}{6}$, what is the value of $x + 17$?
questions.explanation: Solve the equation $ rac{x - 17}{18} =  rac{x - 17}{6}$ for x, then compute x + 17.
